typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		organizationid as string,
		ntt_identifier as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		importsequencenumber as string,
		ntt_moratoriumchildcancellationreasonid as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_parentcancellationreasonid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		createdon as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId as string,
		strNTTName as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidationChildCancellationReason
source(output(
		ntt_applicabletostandardmoratorium as string,
		organizationid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		importsequencenumber as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_applicabletomentalhealthmoratorium as string,
		ntt_moratoriumparentcancellationreasonid as string,
		ntt_midwayreviewquestion as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		ntt_identifier as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_mentalhealthreviewquestion as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		strNTTMoratoriumParentCancellationReasonId as string,
		strNTTName as string,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sourceValidationParentCancellationReason
sourceValidationChildCancellationReason select(mapColumn(
		organizationid,
		ntt_identifier,
		ntt_name,
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		importsequencenumber,
		ntt_moratoriumchildcancellationreasonid,
		createdby,
		modifiedon,
		modifiedby,
		createdon,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		blIsValid,
		tsCreatedOn,
		tsModifiedOn,
		strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId,
		strNTTName,
		blIsTruncate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChildCalcellationReason
sourceValidationParentCancellationReason select(mapColumn(
		organizationid,
		modifiedon,
		ntt_name,
		statecode,
		statuscode,
		importsequencenumber,
		createdby,
		ntt_moratoriumparentcancellationreasonid,
		modifiedby,
		ntt_identifier,
		createdon,
		intBatchId,
		partdist,
		blIsValid,
		tsCreatedOn,
		tsModifiedOn,
		strNTTMoratoriumParentCancellationReasonId,
		strNTTName,
		blIsTruncate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectParentCancellationReason
SelectChildCalcellationReason alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowChildCancellationReason
SelectParentCancellationReason alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowParentCancellationReason
AlterRowParentCancellationReason sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/moratoriums/moratoriumparentcancellationreason',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTMoratoriumParentCancellationReasonId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkParentCancellationReason
AlterRowChildCancellationReason sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/moratoriums/moratoriumchildcancellationreason',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['strNTTMoratoriumChildCancellationReasonId'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partdist
	)) ~> sinkChildCancellationReason
